name: Doomsday 2022
description:
Doomsday 2022 was a project made for Ludum Dare 50 with 6 members. While we had little to no expectations for this project, we were pleasantly surprised by the outcome of the game in such a limited time. Alas, we were unable to complete the full vision of what our game should be, and that is quite a missed opportunity. Nevertheless, it was still an overall positive experience for all us :) Already looking forward to another Game Jam

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Doomsday has hit the year 2022 in the form of a meteor no less. You are a scientist looking to stop the meteor in it's track with your giant laser!
